value.title: Secure an ASP.NET Core web app with the Identity framework
value.excerpt: Add authentication and authorization to an ASP.NET Core web app using the Identity framework.

value.title: Protect your servers and VMs from brute-force and malware attacks with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Stop hackers from getting into your Windows and Linux servers. In this module, you’ll discover how to protect VMs and servers with Azure Security Center

value.title: Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
value.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Introduction to threat modeling
value.excerpt: Explore the four high-level steps of threat modeling.

value.title: Prioritize your issues and apply security controls
value.excerpt: Threat modeling provides you with a list of threats and ways to reduce or eliminate risk, but it doesn't prioritize them for you. Also, there are no layered security control recommendations based on their type and function.

value.title: Use a framework to identify threats and find ways to reduce or eliminate risk
value.excerpt: Threat modeling helps you generate a list of potential threats using STRIDE and find ways to reduce or eliminate risk with corresponding security controls.

value.title: Use recommended tools to create a data-flow diagram
value.excerpt: You can use any canvas, physical or virtual, to create a data-flow diagram. Engineers at Microsoft recommend three tools to help you in your threat modeling journey.

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: 5 Things you didn't know about Azure SQL Database | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn about 5 things you didn't know about Azure SQL Database.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free

value.excerpt: See just how easy it is to deploy a service mesh to your AKS cluster. value.title: Azure AD Managed Service Identity | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Arturo Lucatero joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure AD Managed Service Identity, which can be used to authenticate to any service that supports Azure AD authentication. value.title: Azure Friday | Apache Kafka on HDInsight
value.excerpt: Raghav Mohan joins Scott Hanselman to talk about Apache Kafka on HDInsight, which added the open-source distributed streaming platform last year to complete a scalable, big data streaming scenario on Azure. The service has come a long way since - processing millions of events/sec, petabytes of data/day

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure App Service with Hybrid Connections to On-premises Resources
value.excerpt: Christina Compy joins Scott Hanselman to talk about the recently relaunched App Service Hybrid Connections. This feature enables your apps in the App Service to reach resources on other networks. Those other networks can be in Azure, on-premises or networks in other cloud providers.   Azure App Service
